lead_paragraph: Vin Scully has seen plenty of fracases between the Dodgers and Giants in his 67 years behind the microphone. On Monday, he got to call one more in a way that only the Hall of Fame announcer can.

headline.print_headline: Scully Lends Play-By-Play to Dodgers-Giants Fracas
headline.main: Scully Lends Play-By-Play to Dodgers-Giants Fracas

snippet: Vin Scully has seen plenty of fracases between the Dodgers and Giants in his 67 years behind the microphone. On Monday, he got to call one more in a way that only the Hall of Fame announcer can....
